price: Göklerde ve yerde olan tüm canlılar ve melekler hiç büyüklenmeden Allah’a secde ederler.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِۤ يَسۡجُدُۤ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِن دَآبَّةٖ وَٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَهُمۡ لَا يَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: walillahi yasjudu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi min dābbatin wal-malāikatu wahum lā yastakbirūna
